title: List of members of the United Nations Commission on Human Rights
text:
The <a href="United%20Nations%20Commission%20on%20Human%20Rights">United Nations Commission on Human Rights</a> was a functional commission within the overall framework of the <a href="United%20Nations">United Nations</a> from 1946 until it was replaced by the <a href="United%20Nations%20Human%20Rights%20Council">UN Human Rights Council</a> in 2006. It was a subsidiary body of the <a href="United%20Nations%20Economic%20and%20Social%20Council">UN Economic and Social Council</a> (ECOSOC), which elected members through the mechanism of the <a href="United%20Nations%20Regional%20Groups">United Nations Regional Groups</a>.
Non-members.
The list is a summary of all countries that have never been a member of United Nations Human Rights Council.
